msg: When running in JDK 1.3, copy XML jars to the right location.  Thanks to Markus

author: crossley
msg: Reflect changes to the way that a local catalog is configured.

author: crossley
msg: * Allow configuration of a project local-catalog and the entity resolver
verbosity level, via forrest.properties configuration. This replaces tokens
* Disabled the copy-schema target because it was overwriting the default
Forrest catalog with the project catalog and causing major errors.

author: jefft
msg: Fix bug where the webapp would break due to missing XML jars under JDK
